Attributes.description: Examines economic factors affecting the urban land market, with an emphasis on determinants of urban land values, the housing market, urban transportation, and land use policies.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of COMM 295, ECON 201, ECON 301.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 11:30, End Time: 13:00, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
